text: Ángel de Andrés López (23 October 1951 - 4 May 2016) was a Spanish actor. He appeared in more than 60 movies and television shows between 1977 and 2015. He was known for his roles as Antonio in What Have I Done to Deserve This? (1984) and as Cheyenne in 800 Bullets (2002). On 4 May 2016, Andrés López died at his home in Miraflores de la Sierra, Madrid, Spain from a heart attack, aged 64. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1951 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Spanish movie actors Category:Spanish television actors Category:Actors from Madrid
title: Ángel de Andrés López
